mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_TYPE, HIGH_DIPLOMA, HIGH_SUBJECT, HIGH_COLLEGE, HIGH_DT, HIGH_DEGREE, HIGH_DEGREE_UNIT, HIGH_DEGREE_DT, FOREIGN_LANGUAGES, FOREIGN_DEGREE, FOREIGN_LEVEL, COMPUTER_LEVEL, CHINESE_LEVEL, PRO_NAME, PRO_DT, PRO_JOB, EXPERT_TYPE, EXPERT_LEVEL, TITLE, TITLE_DT, RESEARCH_FIELD, RESEARCH_SPECIAL, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATEDBY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED, VERSION, TRAIN_DOMAIN,TRAIN_DIRECTION,HAVE_EXP,EXP_DESC,MAIN_THESIS,BANK_ACCOUNT
mapper.select:
select tt.*,IDE.id DEPT_ID,IDE.DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME,IDE.REGIONS_CODE,IAR.REGIONS_NAME,t.ROLE_CODE,
From ipanther_user t left join ipanther_user_staff tt on t.id=tt.user_id and tt.is_deleted='N' LEFT JOIN IPANTHER_USER_DEPT IUD ON t.ID = IUD.USER_ID AND IUD.IS_DELETED = 'N' LEFT JOIN IPANTHER_DEPARTMENT IDE ON IDE.ID = IUD.DEPT_ID AND IDE.IS_DELETED = 'N' LEFT JOIN IPANTHER_ADMIN_REGIONS IAR ON IDE.REGIONS_CODE = IAR.REGIONS_CODE AND IAR.IS_DELETED = 'N' where t.is_deleted='N'
and t.id in (${paramMap.userIds})
group by t.ID
mapper.insert: insert into IPANTHER_USER_STAFF (USER_ID, USER_TYPE, HIGH_DIPLOMA, HIGH_SUBJECT, HIGH_COLLEGE, HIGH_DT, HIGH_DEGREE, HIGH_DEGREE_UNIT, HIGH_DEGREE_DT, FOREIGN_LANGUAGES, FOREIGN_DEGREE, FOREIGN_LEVEL, COMPUTER_LEVEL, CHINESE_LEVEL, PRO_NAME, PRO_DT, PRO_JOB, EXPERT_TYPE, EXPERT_LEVEL, TITLE, TITLE_DT, RESEARCH_FIELD, RESEARCH_SPECIAL, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATEDBY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED, VERSION, TRAIN_DOMAIN,TRAIN_DIRECTION,HAVE_EXP,EXP_DESC,MAIN_THESIS,BANK_ACCOUNT) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highDiploma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{highDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highDegreeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highDegreeDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{foreignLanguages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreignDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreignLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{computerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chineseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{proJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{researchField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{researchSpecial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trainDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{trainDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{haveExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mainThesis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update IPANTHER_USER_STAFF
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_DIPLOMA = #{highDiploma,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_SUBJECT = #{highSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_COLLEGE = #{highCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_DT = #{highDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HIGH_DEGREE = #{highDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_DEGREE_UNIT = #{highDegreeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_DEGREE_DT = #{highDegreeDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FOREIGN_LANGUAGES = #{foreignLanguages,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOREIGN_DEGREE = #{foreignDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOREIGN_LEVEL = #{foreignLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPUTER_LEVEL = #{computerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHINESE_LEVEL = #{chineseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_DT = #{proDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRO_JOB = #{proJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERT_TYPE = #{expertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERT_LEVEL = #{expertLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE_DT = #{titleDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESEARCH_FIELD = #{researchField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESEARCH_SPECIAL = #{researchSpecial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION = VERSION+1,
TRAIN_DOMAIN = #{trainDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_DIRECTION = #{trainDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAVE_EXP = #{haveExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXP_DESC = #{expDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_THESIS = #{mainThesis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update IPANTHER_USER_STAFF set USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_DIPLOMA = #{highDiploma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_SUBJECT = #{highSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_COLLEGE = #{highCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_DT = #{highDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HIGH_DEGREE = #{highDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_DEGREE_UNIT = #{highDegreeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGH_DEGREE_DT = #{highDegreeDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FOREIGN_LANGUAGES = #{foreignLanguages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOREIGN_DEGREE = #{foreignDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOREIGN_LEVEL = #{foreignLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPUTER_LEVEL = #{computerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHINESE_LEVEL = #{chineseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_DT = #{proDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRO_JOB = #{proJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT_TYPE = #{expertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT_LEVEL = #{expertLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_DT = #{titleDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESEARCH_FIELD = #{researchField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESEARCH_SPECIAL = #{researchSpecial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = VERSION+1,
TRAIN_DOMAIN = #{trainDomain,jdbcType=DECIMAL} TRAIN_DIRECTION = #{trainDirection,jdbcType=DECIMAL} HAVE_EXP = #{haveExp,jdbcType=DECIMAL} EXP_DESC = #{expDesc,jdbcType=DECIMAL} MAIN_THESIS = #{mainThesis,jdbcType=DECIMAL} BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
